alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 13 at 1:32PM MDT until March 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 10 and 15 inches, mainly on west facing slopes. * WHERE...Absaroka/Beartooth Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Recreation in the high country could be impacted by heavy accumulating snow and local whiteout conditions. Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds could gusts over 60 mph early Tuesday at the higher elevations, with gusts 30 to 40 mph for the rest of the warning period. This could cause dangerous whiteout conditions at times. The heaviest snow is expected Wednesday through Wednesday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
